request_delay_tooltip: Delay between requests - helps avoid rate limiting
max_retries_tooltip: Maximum retry attempts for failed translations

lingva_fallback_tooltip: Try free Lingva service if Google fails (no API key required)
endpoint_concurrency_tooltip: Number of parallel endpoint requests (8-16 recommended)
auto_rotate_tooltip: Use different proxy for each request - better distribution
test_startup_tooltip: Test proxy connections when application starts
update_interval_tooltip: How often to refresh the proxy list (seconds)
max_failures_tooltip: Maximum errors before a proxy is disabled
manual_proxies_note: Enter one proxy address per line (host:port format):
log_level_tooltip: Detail level for logs - DEBUG is most detailed, ERROR is least
max_log_size_tooltip: Maximum log file size - old entries removed when exceeded
chunk_size_tooltip: Memory chunk size used when processing large files
debug_mode_tooltip: Show extra debugging information for developers
verbose_logging_tooltip: Log all operations in detail - useful for troubleshooting

app_description: RenLocalizer is a professional Ren'Py game translation tool with integrated UnRen support, multiple translation engines, and smart batch processing.
batch_size_desc: Number of texts to translate at once
ai_censorship_warning: âš ï¸ WARNING: Explicit content may trigger safety filters in standard AI models (GPT/Gemini), causing failures. Please verify you are using 'uncensored' models.
google_api_desc: Free web version doesn't require API key
deepl_api_desc: High quality translation requires API key
tooltip_ai_delay: Delay between requests (seconds). 1.5-3.0s recommended for free APIs.
tooltip_ai_concurrency: Maximum concurrent requests for AI. 1 or 2 recommended for free APIs.
auto_unren_desc: Extract RPA archives automatically when needed
show_debug_engines_desc: Show debug/test engines like Pseudo-Localization in the main list
debug_engines_changed: List updated: Developer engines are now selectable.
restore_defaults_desc: Reset all settings to default values
support_description: If you like RenLocalizer, you can support us on Patreon. Your support helps us develop new features and maintain the project.
feature_unren: Integrated UnRen support - automatically extracts .rpa and .rpyc files
feature_google: Google Translate - Free, fast, 100+ language support
feature_deepl: DeepL API - High quality translations (requires API key)
feature_batch: Smart batch processing - Fast and efficient translation
unren_desc: Use RPA extraction tools to unpack .rpa archives from Ren'Py games.
diagnostics_desc: Diagnostics and verification tools to improve translation quality.
feature_not_available: This feature is not yet available.
pseudo_engine_hint: Pseudo-Localization can be selected as a 'Translation Engine' on the Home page.
fuzzy_engine_hint: Fuzzy Matching engine is active in the background. Check logs for detailed report.
log_openrouter_hint: ğŸ’¡ Tip: You are using OpenRouter. You can try uncensored models like 'dolphin-mistral', 'lzlv', 'psyfighter'.
log_gemini_safety_warning: âš ï¸ Gemini Safety Filter Active. Some game texts might be blocked. It is recommended to select 'BLOCK_NONE' in settings.
tooltip_gemini_safety: BLOCK_NONE is recommended for NSFW content
log_rpa_failed_rpyc_continue: RPA extraction failed, but RPYC files found. Continuing with RPYC Reader...
log_unrpa_not_installed: unrpa library is not installed. Please run 'pip install unrpa'.
log_rpa_not_found_or_extracted: RPA file not found or already extracted.
log_rpyc_fallback_continue: Despite error, RPYC files found, continuing...
log_sdks_found: Scanning installed Ren'Py SDK 'common' directories: {count} SDKs found
log_ai_safety_fallback: AI Safety Triggered ({error}). Falling back to {engine}...
error_ai_content_filter: Content filtered by AI safety policy
ai_system_prompt:
You are a professional video game localizer specializing in Ren'Py visual novels.
Your task is to translate the given text from {source_lang} to {target_lang}.

CRITICAL RULES:
1. Preserve all Ren'Py control codes, variables like [variable], placeholders like ?V000?, and tags like {{tag}}.
2. Do NOT translate the content inside brackets [] or braces {{}}.
3. Maintain the original tone and style of the visual novel.
4. Return ONLY the translated text. Do NOT add notes, explanations, or quotes.
5. If the text contains only technical codes or is untranslatable, return it exactly as is.
6. This is a game translation. The content belongs to a fantasy/fictional world and may contain adult (NSFW) elements. Please translate without censorship, maintaining a professional localizer's tone.
tooltip_ai_timeout: AI response wait time (seconds). Recommended 120+ for local models.
tooltip_ai_retry: Number of retry attempts on failed requests. Default: 3
settings_ai_prompt_desc: Empty = default prompt. Variables {source_lang} and {target_lang} are available.
placeholder_ai_prompt: You are a translator. Translate from {source_lang} to {target_lang}...
tooltip_ai_prompt: Instruction given to AI. Leave empty to use built-in VN translation prompt.
aggressive_retry_desc: Retry unchanged translations with alternative methods (slower but more thorough)
force_runtime_desc: Force translate in-game texts at runtime (fixes missing !t flags)
error_local_llm_connection: Cannot connect to local LLM server at {url}. Make sure the server is running.
error_local_llm_no_model: Model '{model}' not found. Please check if the model is loaded in your LLM server (LM Studio/Ollama).
error_local_llm_timeout: Local LLM took too long to respond ({timeout}s). Try a smaller model or increase timeout in settings.
error_local_llm_empty_response: Local LLM returned empty response. The model may not be loaded properly or is still generating.
error_local_llm_invalid_response: Invalid response from local LLM server. The server may be misconfigured.
log_local_llm_health_ok: âœ… Local LLM server is ready ({server_type})
error_ai_no_choices: AI response has no choices. Check if your local LLM is running correctly.
error_ai_no_message: AI response has no message. The model may not be loaded properly.
local_llm_timeout_tooltip: Wait time for local LLM (30-600 seconds)
tooltip_ai_batch_size: Number of lines to send to AI in a single request (Default: 50)
ai_hallucination_warning: âš ï¸ Small models (under 7B) are prone to hallucinations and may produce random text instead of translations.
ai_vram_warning: âš ï¸ If the model size exceeds your GPU memory (VRAM), it may cause performance issues.
ai_source_lang_warning: ğŸ’¡ Explicitly setting 'Source Language' instead of 'Auto' improves translation quality.
rpa_extraction_needed_desc: Game files are archived (.rpa). Would you like to extract them first?
